title: Stacey Dash 911 Call: Says Her Husband Put Her In A 'Chokehold'
text:
Stacey Dash claims her husband put her in a chokehold while the couple argued in their Florida home, this according to the 911 call made by the actress.

In the 911 audio, obtained by The Blast, Dash is the one who actually calls the police after she says her whole family was having an argument that turned physical.

Related:

Stacey Dash Dropped 'Clueless' Role to Cops During Domestic Violence Arrest

Stacey Dash Arrested For Domestic Violence For Allegedly Slapping New Husband

Stacey Dash Apparently 'Clueless' Over Tax Owed in New York, Hit Up for Money in California

Stacey Dash Drops Her Bid for Congress Just as Quickly as She Started

Dash says in the call, "I've been assaulted by my husband."

She continues, "We were all arguing, I asked his daughter to get out of my face, she was in my face. I pushed her back and he put me into a chokehold."

View photos

In the tape, someone is then heard disagreeing with her, and she responds "no, you want to see the marks on my neck."

The actress then screams at someone in the home, "I didn't hit you!"

View photos

The "Clueless" actress tells the 911 operator that she is a stepmother to her husband's two children and they are present for the argument.

You can clearly hear her husband, Jeffrey Marty, continuing to argue with the children while cops are racing to the scene.

She says one of the children, who is 15 years old, called her a "f***ing b***h." She explains to the dispatcher the argument started after she tried to get the teenager to do her homework.

View photos

Dash was arrested on domestic violence charges after cops arrived on scene and observed marks on her husbands body.

According to the police report, Stacey allegedly slapped and pushed her husband in the argument. The report says, "the victim sustained red scratch marks to his left upper arm from being pushed."

We obtained video of the arrest, where the actress told the officers she was in the movie, 'Clueless.'
